channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- 404 SEO Redirection
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- 404 SEO Redirection

item.title: CVE-2021-24324|2024-08-03T19:28:23.398Z -- unknown -- 404%20seo%20redirection
item.description: The 404 SEO Redirection WordPress plugin through 1.3 is lacking CSRF checks in all its settings, allowing attackers to make a logged in user change the plugin's settings. Due to the lack of sanitisation and escaping in some fields, it could also lead to Stored Cross-Site Scripting issues

item.title: CVE-2021-24325|2024-08-03T19:28:23.471Z -- unknown -- 404%20seo%20redirection
item.description: The tab parameter of the settings page of the 404 SEO Redirection WordPress plugin through 1.3 is vulnerable to a reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) issue as user input is not properly sanitised or escaped before being output in an attribute.
